title: The Billionaire Trying to Turn Kazakhstan Into a Tennis Nation
description: Bulat Utemuratov decided in 2007 to create a tennis culture for the masses in a former Soviet Republic known for combat sports and weight lifting.
dc:creator: Matthew Futterman
media:description: Rybakina embraced Bulat Utemuratov, President of the Kazakhstan Tennis Federation after winning Wimbledon earlier this year.
